languages.text: "Разумеется, Ваша Светлость! Чартисты, доставившие меня, были весьма услужливы и... внимательны к моим взыскательным вкусам. А главное — быстры, ведь я бы не посмела заставить вас ждать хоть секундой дольше необходимого".

traits.locale_text: "Разумеется, Ваша Светлость! Как только получила вашу весточку, без промедлений погрузилась на ближайшее чартистское судно. Я бы не посмела заставлять вас ждать хоть секундой дольше необходимого".

languages.text: "Most certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The chartists who took me here were quite forthcoming and... attentive to my exacting tastes. But most importantly, they were fast, as I wouldn't dare keep you waiting for a second longer than necessary."
languages.original_text: "Разумеется, Ваша Светлость! Чартисты, доставившие меня, были весьма услужливы и... внимательны к моим взыскательным вкусам. А главное — быстры, ведь я бы не посмела заставить вас ждать хоть секундой дольше необходимого".

traits.locale_text: "Most certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The chartists who took me here were quite forthcoming and... attentive to my exacting tastes. But most importantly, they were fast, as I wouldn't dare keep you waiting for a second longer than necessary."

"Most certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The chartists who took me here were quite forthcoming and... attentive to my exacting tastes. But most importantly, they were fast, as I wouldn't dare keep you waiting for a second longer than necessary."

"Most certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The chartists who took me here were quite forthcoming and... attentive to my exacting tastes. But most importantly, they were fast, as I wouldn't dare keep you waiting for a second longer than necessary."

languages.text: «¡Así ha sido, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Los cartistas que me trajeron aquí fueron muy agradables y... receptivos a mis exigentes preferencias. Pero, lo que es más importante, han sido rápidos, pues no osaría hacerle esperar un segundo más de lo estrictamente necesario».
languages.original_text: "Most certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The chartists who took me here were quite forthcoming and... attentive to my exacting tastes. But most importantly, they were fast, as I wouldn't dare keep you waiting for a second longer than necessary."

traits.locale_text: «¡Así ha sido, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Los cartistas que me trajeron aquí fueron muy agradables y... receptivos a mis exigentes preferencias. Pero, lo que es más importante, han sido rápidos, pues no osaría hacerle esperar un segundo más de lo estrictamente necesario».

languages.text: 「えぇ、それはもう、陛下！私をここまで案内してくれたチャーティストたちはよく話をしてくれて…私の厳しい好みにも気をつけてくれました。ですが、一番よかったのは、彼らのスピード感です。必要以上にあなたをお待たせしたくはありませんでしたから」
languages.original_text: "Most certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The chartists who took me here were quite forthcoming and... attentive to my exacting tastes. But most importantly, they were fast, as I wouldn't dare keep you waiting for a second longer than necessary."

traits.locale_text: 「えぇ、それはもう、陛下！私をここまで案内してくれたチャーティストたちはよく話をしてくれて…私の厳しい好みにも気をつけてくれました。ですが、一番よかったのは、彼らのスピード感です。必要以上にあなたをお待たせしたくはありませんでしたから」

languages.text: “没有遇到任何问题，大人！带我来这里的宪章船长非常合作……而且相当用心地满足了我苛刻的喜好。最重要的是，他们做事很有效率。毕竟您的时间非常宝贵，我一秒钟都不敢耽搁。”
languages.original_text: "Most certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The chartists who took me here were quite forthcoming and... attentive to my exacting tastes. But most importantly, they were fast, as I wouldn't dare keep you waiting for a second longer than necessary."

traits.locale_text: “没有遇到任何问题，大人！带我来这里的宪章船长非常合作……而且相当用心地满足了我苛刻的喜好。最重要的是，他们做事很有效率。毕竟您的时间非常宝贵，我一秒钟都不敢耽搁。”

languages.text: "Natürlich, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Die Chartisten, die mich hergebracht haben, waren sehr zuvorkommend und ... aufmerksam, was meinen anspruchsvollen Geschmack angeht. Vor allem aber waren sie schnell, denn ich würde es nicht wagen, Euch auch nur eine Sekunde länger als nötig warten zu lassen."
languages.original_text: "Most certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The chartists who took me here were quite forthcoming and... attentive to my exacting tastes. But most importantly, they were fast, as I wouldn't dare keep you waiting for a second longer than necessary."

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Die Chartisten, die mich hergebracht haben, waren sehr zuvorkommend und ... aufmerksam, was meinen anspruchsvollen Geschmack angeht. Vor allem aber waren sie schnell, denn ich würde es nicht wagen, Euch auch nur eine Sekunde länger als nötig warten zu lassen."

languages.text: « On ne peut mieux, Votre Seigneurie ! Les cartographes qui m'ont escortée jusqu'ici se sont mis à mon entière disposition et... ils ont répondu à toutes mes exigences. Mais aussi et surtout, ils ont fait preuve d'une diligence remarquable, tant je m'en serais voulue de vous faire attendre une seconde de plus que nécessaire. »
languages.original_text: "Most certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The chartists who took me here were quite forthcoming and... attentive to my exacting tastes. But most importantly, they were fast, as I wouldn't dare keep you waiting for a second longer than necessary."

traits.locale_text: « On ne peut mieux, Votre Seigneurie ! Les cartographes qui m'ont escortée jusqu'ici se sont mis à mon entière disposition et... ils ont répondu à toutes mes exigences. Mais aussi et surtout, ils ont fait preuve d'une diligence remarquable, tant je m'en serais voulue de vous faire attendre une seconde de plus que nécessaire. »

languages.text: "Kesinlikle çıkmadı {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Beni buraya getiren haritacılar, bir hayli açık sözlüydü ve... Yemek konusunda seçici oluşuma özen gösterdiler. Ancak en önemlisi hızlı olmalarıydı. Zira sizi gerekenden bir saniye bile fazla bekletmeye cüret edemem."
languages.original_text: "Most certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The chartists who took me here were quite forthcoming and... attentive to my exacting tastes. But most importantly, they were fast, as I wouldn't dare keep you waiting for a second longer than necessary."
